DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop laboratory-based assay real-time PCR test detect organism N. gonorrhoeae important genetic marker antimicrobial resistance . This study also determine factor associate gonorrhoea describe sexual behaviour men sex men , inform parameter mathematical model gonorrhoea transmission antimicrobial resistant gonorrhoea .

Participant risk N. gonorrhoeae infection .
